summary: Browser extension with an overlay pop-up dog companion that provides encouragement, allows feeding/petting interactions, note-taking functionality, and break reminders at set intervals
architectural_notes: Popup UI for dog companion interface
Local storage for user preferences and break timer settings
Chrome extension format (can be loaded unpacked from zip)

existing_features.title: Create a browser extension manifest (manifest.json) that enables the extension to inject content scripts into web pages and display an overlay
Implement an overlay component that displays a dog character on any webpage the user visits
Create a system where the dog displays random encouraging messages to the user at regular intervals
Implement a feeding interaction where users can click to feed the dog, triggering visual feedback and animations
Implement a petting interaction where users can click to pet the dog, triggering happy animations and responses
Add a note-taking interface accessible through the dog overlay where users can create, view, edit, and delete notes
Implement a break reminder system where users can set custom time intervals and receive notifications from the dog to take breaks
Create a build system that packages the extension as a downloadable zip file containing all necessary files (manifest, scripts, assets)

Design a visually appealing and cohesive interface with warm, friendly colors and playful typography that reinforces the encouraging companion theme throughout all dog interactions, using soft gradients and rounded corners
Debug and fix the Internet Identity login flow in the extension content script to ensure users can successfully authenticate when clicking the login button in the DogOverlay component
Verify that authenticated users can create, read, edit, and delete notes through the NotesPanel after login
Verify that authenticated users can set break reminder intervals and receive notifications through the BreakReminderPanel after login
Debug and fix the blank page issue that occurs when users are redirected to id.ai/#authorize during the Internet Identity login flow in the browser extension content script

new_feature_requests.summary: Overlay pop-up dog that displays on browser pages
Dog says encouraging things to the user
Note-taking functionality through the dog interface
Dog reminds user to take breaks after set times
Extension can be downloaded as a zip file
